tabs.name: At Home
tabs.title: Ather Dot  / Portable Charger
tabs.text: Personal Charger fixed at your parking spot. Charge using any 5Amp socket. Carry it your boot.

tabs.text: Societies, offices, universities, Charge where you are

tabs.text: Public chargers to top up on-the-go
